title: Calories in Pita Bread
meta_description: Discover calories in pita bread per serving, including carbs, protein, fat, and full nutrition breakdown for easy meal planning.
assumptions: One medium 6-inch (60g) white pita bread, plain, baked, no added oil or fillings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, flour type, and baking method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One medium pita bread has about 165 kcal and 5.5 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp olive oil for brushing

faqs.q: How many calories in one pita bread?
faqs.a: About 165 kcal for one medium white pita bread.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in pita bread?
faqs.a: Around 33 g carbs per medium pita, with 1.3 g fiber.

faqs.q: Is pita bread high in protein?
faqs.a: It provides 5.5 g protein per serving, moderate for bread.

faqs.q: Calories in whole wheat vs. white pita bread?
faqs.a: Whole wheat is similar, about 175 kcal per medium, but higher fiber.
Typically 0 mg cholesterol, as it's plant-based.
